text: Ludwig van Beethoven's Piano Sonata No. 10 in G major, Op. 14, No. 2, is a piece of music for solo piano. It was written between 1798 and 1799. The sonata was dedicated to Baroness Josefa von Braun.Tovey, D.F. (1931) Commentary on Beethoven's Piano Sonatas, London, ABRSM.Ball, P. (2010) The Music Instinct, London, The Bodley Head The sonata is approximately 15 minutes long. ==Form== The sonata is in three movements: ==References== Category:Compositions in G major Piano Sonata 010
title: Piano Sonata No. 10 (Beethoven)
